# NSSupportsSuddenTermination

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value indicating whether the system may terminate the app to log out or shut down more quickly.

## Termination

- **LSGetAppDiedEvents**: A Boolean value indicating whether the app is notified when a child process dies.
- **UIApplicationExitsOnSuspend**: A Boolean value indicating whether the app terminates, rather than moves to the background, when the app quits.
